title: Upcoming Witcher 3 Repack Details
body:
Well, it’s done and needs just some more tests.

Here’s a quick peek of changes.

Size for any single language (voiceovers, all texts languages included by default): 23.5 GB – new world record, I’ve beaten my previous repack nearly by 600 MB

Installation time decreased for about 20-30 minutes on HDD, even more on SSD.
On 8-cores CPUs and SSD this repack is the fastest in the world.

Unfortunately, due to lots of changes in game files, backwards compatibilty is limited to bins 02 and 07, saving you 4.7 GB. Well, it’s better than nothing.

ETA: Today
